article.title: ERAPSCO to Provide Thousands of Sonobuoys
article.text: ERAPSCO, Columbia City, Indiana, is being awarded a $178,565,050 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract (N00421-14-D-0025) to exercise an option for the procurement of up to 6,000 AN/SSQ-36 sonobuoys; 95,000 AN/SSQ-53 sonobuoys; 15,500 AN/SSQ-62 sonobuoys; 10,000 AN/SSQ-101 sonobuoys; and 10,000 AN/SSQ-125 sonobuoys. Work will be performed in DeLeon Springs, Florida (51.7 percent), and Columbia City (48.3 percent), and it is expected to be completed in October 2017. No funding will be obligated at time of award; funds will be obligated on individual delivery orders as they are issued. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
